Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.core

Interface SignServiceHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuditLogger, AuthenticationHandler, KeyAndCertificateHandler, ProtocolHandler, SignatureHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSignServiceHandler
    public interface SignServiceHandler
    Base interface for a SignService "handler".

    Handlers exist for different purposes such as user authentication, audit loggers, key and certificate handler and more. A SignServiceEngine instance is configured with specific handler instances to service a client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getName()
      Gets the name of the handler.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        @Nonnull
String getName()
        Gets the name of the handler.

        If the handler name has not been explicitly set the "simple" class name for the handler instance must be used.

        Returns:
        the handler name
